user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mark Johnson (mark@helpinghands.org) with the necessary details for the upcoming charity gala. You can check out my NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Gala Details from NotionManager

Hello NotionManager Team,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me the most up-to-date information about the upcoming charity gala—specifically the date, time, venue, program schedule, dress code, confirmed speakers (including Mr. Thomas Anderson), sponsorship highlights, and any RSVP or contact details?  

Once I have these details, I’ll draft the email for Mark Johnson with everything he needs.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
Subject: Request for Gala Details from NotionManager

Hello NotionManager Team,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me the most up-to-date information about the upcoming charity gala—specifically the date, time, venue, program schedule, dress code, confirmed speakers (including Mr. Thomas Anderson), sponsorship highlights, and any RSVP or contact details?  

Once I have these details, I’ll draft the email for Mark Johnson with everything he needs.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
